channel.title: hack on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in hack on Nomad's reflections

item.title: Hackathon in Lviv
item.description: Great news! Best Hackathon traditions to invade Lviv. DOU is planning a hackathon @ June 9 — 10. Location is not set yet, but people are welcome to join now, so that we know there’ll be enough people comming. More details here. If anyone interested to create a team – reach me via comments here or on IMs…

item.title: Nokia OVI suite & sms extract.
item.description: There was a nice program for syncing phone and PC called Nokia PC Suite. While still available on some dusty hard drives it is now replaced with something called Nokia Ovi Suite. As I mentioned before – nice piece of software if we forget about all the “store” thing. But it has one important for me thing missing – sms extracting mechanism. You can’t just take all of your sms and store to the file you want.
